ED_Title: High-level meeting of the General Assembly to commemorate the twentieth anniversary of the adoption of the Durban Declaration and Programme of Action
ED_DecisionText:
At its 5th plenary meeting, on 22 September 2021, the General Assembly, on the proposal of its President, recalling its resolution 75/320 of 2 September 2021, decided to appoint Her  Excellency Naledi Pandor, Minister for International Relations and Cooperation of South Africa, as the Chair of round table one, and His Excellency Pacôme Moubelet Boubeya, Minister for Foreign Affairs of Gabon, as the Chair
of round table two of the high-level meeting of the General Assembly to commemorate the twentieth anniversary of the adoption of the Durban Declaration and Programme of Action.
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the main part of the session will be contained in document A/76/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
